Header: Facebook parties to be inspected thoroughly
Content: The police has decided to inspect parties organized based on Facebook, thoroughly. The inspections will be conducted under the directives of IGP Pujith Jayasundera. The IGP has already issued a set of guidelines to OICs all over the island. It has been revealed that drug traffickers are connected with Facebook parties being organized. The IGP has instructed the OICs to apprehend organizers of such parties if they are linked with illegal activities and drug trafficking.
